First!!

I can almost promise you nothing from SP+ will be compatible with the integrated SP+. Most likely the part names/indentifiers will change and you will have duplicates until you uninstall. For example, all the SP+ parts have "SP+" in the name. The new ones will likely be "Mk II Cockpit" and the like. Any existing planes will probably have to be re-built before uninstalling the SP+ addon.

Of course I could still be wrong but I really doubt it.
